text: Cercinthus elegans is a species of bugs in the tribe Coreini. It is found in the Canary Islands.Une espèce mythique, Cercinthus elegans (Brullé, 1839) : Redescription du type [Heteroptera, Coreidae] = A mythical species, Cercinthus elegans (Brullé, 1839) : Redescription of the type [Heteroptera, Coreidae]. Moulet P. and Pluot-Sigwalt D., Revue française d'entomologie, 1998, vol. 20, no3, pp. 109-114 == References == == External links == * * * Cercinthus elegans at eu-nomen.eu Category:Coreini Category:Insects described in 1839 Category:Fauna of the Canary Islands Category:Taxa named by Gaspard Auguste Brullé
title: Cercinthus elegans
